headline: C.H. Robinson price target raised to $182 from $167 at BofA
summary: BofA raised the firm’s price target on C.H. Robinson (CHRW) to $182 from $167 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm, which sees an improving outlook despite an end of quarter spike in spot rates given continued cost controls, increased its Q4 EPS estimate to $1.14, which it notes is just above the Street’s $1.13 forecast.Claim 70% Off TipRanks This Holiday SeasonUnlock hedge fund-level data and powerful investing tools for smarter, sharper decisions Stay ahead of the market with the lat
